data.price: Şübhəsiz ki, çətinliklə bərabər bir asanlıq vardır.
Əlbəttə ki, çətinliklə bərabər bir asanlıq vardır.

dua.name: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
dua.significanceReason: Promises divine relief after difficulty, offering hope and comfort to those experiencing mental and emotional challenges.

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
